name: Venger
description:
AWARD WINNING Venger now at a BARGAIN price of $1.

Play in NORMAL or new STEREOSCOPIC 3D modes.

Spread across 20 frenzied levels in both normal and insane difficulty levels.

Features
- 20 levels with boss battles in easy and hard modes
- accelerometer controls
- play full colour or 3d
- support for red/blue, red/green and red/cyan 3d glasses
- collectable missiles, health and weapons boosters
- thrust and break controls
- openfeint support for leaderboards

---------------------------------

Attack Force - Protectors of Freedom
Big Booty
